Body:
Description: Hi Team, 

We are ongoing audit as of now, they have requested us to provide application hardening provided by vendor. Can you help me to provide this, not the OS hardening but application hardening. Please check and let us know asap as this is very urgent request. Thank you.

Hi Saqib,

Please make sure to confirm severity of this ticket. They can still use the product but they now have external factors which makes their case critical.

Â 

This can be an opportunity to go above and beyond.

What We've Learned Updated: The customer has an ongoing audit, and they want to know if there is any "application hardening" done to NEA. They have been informed about the RBAC and SSL secure process.
Next Steps Updated: I have sent follow up email to the customer today. If no response is received, I will follow up with them on 13/03/2025
Next Steps Updated: Customer is not responding back. Closing ticket now
